1370: Adolfus moved to Breestraat.A.18 after marriage.
Got married to Lenildis at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Lenildis, Ryccie, at age 25.
Lost daughter Ryccie when Ryccie was 1 years old.
1374: Lost son Daniel when Daniel was 0 years old.
Lenildis gave birth to their stillborn son Daniel in 1374.
1375: Had a daughter with Lenildis, Waldrada, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Lenildis, Flore, at age 32.
1378: Lost daughter Waldrada when Waldrada was 4 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1383: Lost his wife Lenildis while she was giving birth to Clarebout in 1383.
Became caretaker of Flore, Clarebout at age 39.
